email.title: Weekly Digest

image.alt: A pair of hands kneading cookie dough
image.title: Digest Biscuit [WIP]

email.text:
Hi everyone!
Hope you've had a great week!
Read on to find out more about: * IC Hello World - an upcoming virtual beginners' hackathon! * Bloomberg's Women in Tech Networking Event * Jane Street's virtual employee panel
email.heading: IC Hello World!

event.text:
IC Hello World is a virtual beginners' hackathon for Imperial College London students!
More details to be announced soon on the [https://ichelloworld.org/](ichelloworld.org website)!

email.heading: Bloomberg Women in Tech Networking Event
email.sponsor:
**Bloomberg Women in Tech Networking Event**
**Wednesday 3rd March 2021**
At Bloomberg We strive to create a working environment that values difference, fosters inclusion and promotes collaboration. Our global community of diverse engineers take on some of the worldâ€™s most interesting and important technical challenges.
We are running a Bloomberg Women in tech networking event and workshop on Wednesday 3rd March 2021.
What can you expect?
* The opportunity to network with our female engineers
* Get insights into how you can advance your career in tech whilst at university
* Gain some tips on how you can apply and interview for a role in tech with convenience
* Find out what we do at Bloomberg and what it is like to work in our London office
* What does a successful software engineer look like at Bloomberg?
### When is it?
Date: Wednesday 3rd March 2021 Time: 3:00 pm - 6:00 pm
### How can I attend?
Register your details [here](https://tinyurl.com/y5q3gfap) and we will send through a confirmation email with the joining details.
We can't wait to see you on the day!
Regards, The Bloomberg Engineering Recruitment Team
email.heading: Connect with Jane Street
email.sponsor:
![Poster](https://i.imgur.com/VQMW8sI.png)
## Connect with Jane Street!
### Friday 12th March @ 1:00pm - 2:00pm GMT
### Event: Virtual Employee Panel
### Audience: Self identifying women, transgender, and gender-expansive students
Interested in learning more about Jane Street and how we think? Join us for this 60-minute virtual event!
We invite women, transgender, and gender-expansive people to join us and meet Streeters on our employee panel. You will have an opportunity to learn about the roles within our firm and how we solve challenges at Jane Street. This event is for students at any point in their academic career from any degree background.
Please sign up by **Wednesday 10th March** if you're interested in attending. We will confirm attendees and provide Zoom meeting details by Thursday 11th March. We hope to see you there!
## [Sign up](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1leWoBnAD1lLEi3TTswgl4K4J6AwZZprr6Q9C12VSKjM/prefill)
**Want to check out Jane Street ahead of the event?** Visit our [Virtual Info Booth](https://www.janestreet.com/join-jane-street/info-booth/). Navigate to video content, Signals & Threads podcast, office tours, puzzles, and more!
